headquarters: Cannith East, Korth Enclave (Karrnath); Cannith West, Aundair Enclave (near Fairhaven, Aundair); Cannith South, Cannith Tower (Sharn, Breland)
leader: Cannith East, Zorlan d’Cannith; Cannith West, Jorlanna d’Cannith; Cannith South, Merrix d’Cannith
business: Dominates all forms of manufacturing, both mystical and mundane
characteristics: The unspoken leader of the Twelve
Raised up by the war and destroyed by it (was based in Cyre)
